excerpt: "This move of AI to the device level is a development that has been closely followed by chip suppliers to the smartphone market, such as Qualcomm Inc. The chipmaker has been working to integrate models, such as the AI-to-text image rendering solution Stable Diffusion, into the smartphone processing engine."
